languages.text: "Простое условие: жизнь банды в обмен на Меркатум Табула Официале". {n}Джай взмахивает гривой густых волос и непривычно скалится.{/n} "Вот только я не собираюсь никому отдавать свою грамоту! И ребят в беде бросать тоже не собираюсь. Потому и молю вас о помощи и покровительстве, шерин. В клетку с гиенами лучше соваться вместе со львом".

traits.locale_text: "Простое условие: жизнь банды в обмен на Меркатум Табула Официале". {n}Джай взмахивает гривой густых волос и непривычно скалится.{/n} "Вот только я не собираюсь никому отдавать свою грамоту! И ребят в беде бросать тоже не собираюсь. Потому и молю вас о помощи и покровительстве, шерин. В клетку с гиенами лучше соваться вместе со львом".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "And they only want one thing: my Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for my gang's lives." {n}Jae tosses her thick mane of hair and grits her teeth, looking more vicious than you have ever seen her.{/n} "But I'm not giving up my certificate for anything! And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."
languages.original_text: "Простое условие: жизнь банды в обмен на Меркатум Табула Официале". {n}Джай взмахивает гривой густых волос и непривычно скалится.{/n} "Вот только я не собираюсь никому отдавать свою грамоту! И ребят в беде бросать тоже не собираюсь. Потому и молю вас о помощи и покровительстве, шерин. В клетку с гиенами лучше соваться вместе со львом".

And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."

And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そしてヤツらが望んでいるのはただ一つ、ギャングの命と引き換えにあたしのメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れることよ」{n}ジェイははフサフサの長い髪を、振り払い、歯を食いしばり、これまで見たことのないほど凶悪な表情をしている。{/n}「だけど、あたしはどんな理由があっても証明書を放棄するつもりはない。そして、あたしの仲間たちを見放すつもりもないの。だから、あたしはあんたに助けてくれるよう、守ってくれるようを頼んでるってわけよ、シャリーン。もしハイエナの檻に入らなければならないなら、ライオンを側に置いて入りたいって思うの」
languages.original_text: "And they only want one thing: my Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for my gang's lives." {n}Jae tosses her thick mane of hair and grits her teeth, looking more vicious than you have ever seen her.{/n} "But I'm not giving up my certificate for anything! And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてヤツらが望んでいるのはただ一つ、ギャングの命と引き換えにあたしのメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れることよ」{n}ジェイははフサフサの長い髪を、振り払い、歯を食いしばり、これまで見たことのないほど凶悪な表情をしている。{/n}「だけど、あたしはどんな理由があっても証明書を放棄するつもりはない。そして、あたしの仲間たちを見放すつもりもないの。だから、あたしはあんたに助けてくれるよう、守ってくれるようを頼んでるってわけよ、シャリーン。もしハイエナの檻に入らなければならないなら、ライオンを側に置いて入りたいって思うの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “他们想要的东西只有一样，那就是我的帝国官方行商执照。他们要我用这张执照来换那些人的命。”{n}婕伊甩了甩浓密的头发，咬紧了牙，看起来比以往任何时候都要更加凶狠。{/n}“但无论发生什么事情，我都不打算放弃我的执照！我也不打算让我的人曝尸荒野，所以我才要恳求你的帮助与保护，亲爱的。如果我不得不走进豺狼的囚笼里，我希望能有一头狮子在我身边。”
languages.original_text: "And they only want one thing: my Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for my gang's lives." {n}Jae tosses her thick mane of hair and grits her teeth, looking more vicious than you have ever seen her.{/n} "But I'm not giving up my certificate for anything! And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."

traits.locale_text: “他们想要的东西只有一样，那就是我的帝国官方行商执照。他们要我用这张执照来换那些人的命。”{n}婕伊甩了甩浓密的头发，咬紧了牙，看起来比以往任何时候都要更加凶狠。{/n}“但无论发生什么事情，我都不打算放弃我的执照！我也不打算让我的人曝尸荒野，所以我才要恳求你的帮助与保护，亲爱的。如果我不得不走进豺狼的囚笼里，我希望能有一头狮子在我身边。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Y lo que quiere es algo en concreto: mi Mercatum Tabula Officiale, a cambio de las vidas de mi chicos». {n}Jae enreda su espesa melena y aprieta los dientes, con un aspecto más feroz que nunca.{/n} «¡Pero no pienso renunciar a mi certificado así como así! Ni tampoco voy a dejar a mis chicos en la estacada. Por eso le pido ayuda y protección, shereen. Si he de meterme en una jaula de hienas, prefiero que sea con un león a mi lado».
languages.original_text: "And they only want one thing: my Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for my gang's lives." {n}Jae tosses her thick mane of hair and grits her teeth, looking more vicious than you have ever seen her.{/n} "But I'm not giving up my certificate for anything! And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."

traits.locale_text: «Y lo que quiere es algo en concreto: mi Mercatum Tabula Officiale, a cambio de las vidas de mi chicos». {n}Jae enreda su espesa melena y aprieta los dientes, con un aspecto más feroz que nunca.{/n} «¡Pero no pienso renunciar a mi certificado así como así! Ni tampoco voy a dejar a mis chicos en la estacada. Por eso le pido ayuda y protección, shereen. Si he de meterme en una jaula de hienas, prefiero que sea con un león a mi lado».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « En vérité, ils ne veulent qu'une chose : ma Mercatum Tabula Officiale. En échange, ils laisseront à mes gars la vie sauve. » {n}Jae repousse son épaisse chevelure et dévoile ses dents dans un rictus. Vous ne l'avez jamais vu arborer une expression aussi cruelle.{/n} « Il est hors de question que je renonce à mon certificat ! Mais je ne veux pas non plus laisser tomber mes associés. C'est pour ça que je vais avoir besoin de votre aide et de votre protection, shereen. Si je dois entrer dans la cage aux hyènes, j'aime autant être accompagnée {mf|d'un lion|d'une lionne}. »
languages.original_text: "And they only want one thing: my Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for my gang's lives." {n}Jae tosses her thick mane of hair and grits her teeth, looking more vicious than you have ever seen her.{/n} "But I'm not giving up my certificate for anything! And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."

traits.locale_text: « En vérité, ils ne veulent qu'une chose : ma Mercatum Tabula Officiale. En échange, ils laisseront à mes gars la vie sauve. » {n}Jae repousse son épaisse chevelure et dévoile ses dents dans un rictus. Vous ne l'avez jamais vu arborer une expression aussi cruelle.{/n} « Il est hors de question que je renonce à mon certificat ! Mais je ne veux pas non plus laisser tomber mes associés. C'est pour ça que je vais avoir besoin de votre aide et de votre protection, shereen. Si je dois entrer dans la cage aux hyènes, j'aime autant être accompagnée {mf|d'un lion|d'une lionne}. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sie verlangen nur eines: mein Mercatum Tabula Officiale im Austausch für das Leben meiner Bande." {n}Jae schüttelt ihre Mähne und fletscht die Zähne. So wild hast du sie noch nie gesehen.{/n} "Aber ich gebe mein Zertifikat um keinen Preis her! Und ich lasse auch meine Leute nicht im Stich. Daher bitte ich Euch um Hilfe und Schutz, Shereen. Wenn ich schon in einen Käfig voller Hyänen steigen muss, habe ich lieber {mf|einen Löwen|eine Löwin} an meiner Seite."
languages.original_text: "And they only want one thing: my Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for my gang's lives." {n}Jae tosses her thick mane of hair and grits her teeth, looking more vicious than you have ever seen her.{/n} "But I'm not giving up my certificate for anything! And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."

traits.locale_text: "Sie verlangen nur eines: mein Mercatum Tabula Officiale im Austausch für das Leben meiner Bande." {n}Jae schüttelt ihre Mähne und fletscht die Zähne. So wild hast du sie noch nie gesehen.{/n} "Aber ich gebe mein Zertifikat um keinen Preis her! Und ich lasse auch meine Leute nicht im Stich. Daher bitte ich Euch um Hilfe und Schutz, Shereen. Wenn ich schon in einen Käfig voller Hyänen steigen muss, habe ich lieber {mf|einen Löwen|eine Löwin} an meiner Seite."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şartları da belli. Benim Mercatum Tabula Officiale karşılığında çocukların hayatı." {n}Gür saçlarını savuran Jae, dişlerini şimdiye dek hiç tanık olmadığın bir vahşilikte sıkıyor.{/n} "Ancak o tasdiknameyi hiçbir şeye değişmem! Dostlarımı da ortada bırakacak değilim. Bu yüzden desteğini, korumanı istiyorum şirinim. Sırtlanların inine gireceksem yanımda bir aslan olsun, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "And they only want one thing: my Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for my gang's lives." {n}Jae tosses her thick mane of hair and grits her teeth, looking more vicious than you have ever seen her.{/n} "But I'm not giving up my certificate for anything! And nor am I going to leave my guys high and dry. That's why I am begging for your help and protection, shereen. If I have to step into a cage of hyenas, I'd rather do it with a lion at my side."

traits.locale_text: "Şartları da belli... Benim Mercatum Tabula Officiale karşılığında ekibimin hayatı." {n}Jae, gür saçlarını savurup dişlerini sıkıyor. Şimdiye kadar hiç tanık olmadığın, vahşi bir havası var.{/n} "Ancak o tasdiknameyi hiçbir şeye değişmem! Dostlarımı da ortada bırakacak değilim. Bu yüzden desteğini, korumanı istiyorum şirinim. Sırtlanların inine gireceksem yanımda bir aslan olsun, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
